content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out having a smoke and saw a circle i passed it off as a bird because their wings dont always show up at high altitudes but as soon as i thought that it disappeared like a whomp lol disintigrating. it was coming from the west and heading southwest but disappeared. i thought it was a light trick on a bird so i waited for a while and nothing showed back up. i was feeling wowed and noticed it wasn't like the usual ships i see around here. lol  i am feeling tired and its an hour later. i didn't lost sight of the object it just disappeared. how do explain that? cool stuff! xd i swear i didn't call those ships in! no communications with it either. this photo isn't it but its the closest picture that fits the description.
content.summary: Metallic sphere flying then disappears in midday!

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and went out to my front porch to smoke after a 1 1/2 hr. nap. the sky was very clear as it had rained earlier and all the stars were out. i'm a stargazer and in seattle the opportunities to 'gaze' are fewer. i was orienting myself to the 3:00 am sky from how i saw it earlier.  i was facing west over the top of my house.  i saw several random spark-like flashes in the sky.  i have previously seen high flying jets which had intermittent strobe flashes, but there were no jets in this case.  i also saw what looked like the whole sky flashing as if there were lightning storms out of sight, but where i was, there were no clouds.
 i stared at what i thought was a planet about 10 degrees above my chimney, jupiter like in size..Thinking what planet is that? after 3 or 4 seconds it suddenly took off heading south. i was astonished! as i followed it, it slowed way down, almost stopping, changed direction upward, then became dimmer star-like, and continued south. watching it change directions gave me a rush of goosebumps. i was able to follow it visually for close to 15 seconds, until i lost sight behind trees,  while i was watching it, i became awared of a bright, (again what i thought was a planet, light through holes in the tree foilage in my left peripheral vision.  after losing sight of the first object, i trained my attention to this object only to realize that it was also moving, and going toward the one i had just lost sight of. it was travelling east to west, and just like the first one, it was jupiter-like in size.  i ran out into my yard to keep it in view.  after 4 or 5 seconds, it went from bright to dim, and continued west, being in view for aprox 12 seconds.  i went in to note the time and grab my binoculars. 

i stood out in the yard watching.  the big dipper was low in the nw sky
suddenly i saw a bright flash south of the big dipper and saw an obect travelling north toward the dipper. i saw another like object coming toward it at an angle very fast, then slowing and matching the first one's speed and direction. when the second one slowed down it emitted a brilliant red-orange flash.  they travelled along and then through the stars making up the handle of the big dipper. i watched for some 25 seconds with binoculars until they both dimmed out of sight due to distance.  i saw a number, maybe 4 o 5 random spark-like flashes in the sky, and called it quits when clouds began to move in. the sky was lightening towards the dawn.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four ufo's in 12 minutes plus random sparking lights  in sky

content.detailedDescription: Would rather not write to much more, it has always been my grandfather and i's secret. since his passing, i feel alone with this now. he always said... don't tell your grandmother:>)  i think she already knows.  i am telling my story now because i feel (them) now more than ever.  grandpa and i witnessed this because you were not allowed to smoke in the house. we would stand out back and watch the sky's every night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Since is was a little girl there have be many objects observed in my grandmas back yard, some so scary my grandpa and i would hurry into the house.  when i was around 19, i woke up with 4 of (them) around my bed i could not speak or move for awhile..  ,

content.detailedDescription:
West chester, pa. july 4th, 2013, approximately 10pm. 

i was out in my backyard with my 21 year old son. we were just hanging out enjoying the evening when i saw an odd flicker in the western sky. i got up from the table and watched it get closer. because of the date and the flickering, i thought it was a rogue firework. as it got closer it appeared to be a delta shaped object in the sky (shape determined by light placement). i said, "what the hell is that?" my son got up and we both saw the object silently move directly above where we were. it was hard to tell how high it was. there were red lights on each corner, and, incredibly, the starboard, aft corner was completely engulfed in flames (so we didn't see a red light there). we watched it as it went from west to east, holding altitude, until it was out of sight behind trees and buildings(about 2 minutes). the fire we saw on the corner was not something small or in the form or shape of a fuel propellant; it was like watching a house on fire. 

i checked for reports initially of any aircraft experiencing such an event, but found nothing, and didn't really look into it any further.

we never reported what we saw, until now. i just keep thinking how strange it was, and decided to finally share the event.
content.summary: Triangle shape craft with red lights on each corner and on fire

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car parked on a small car ferry crossing from mainland (strawberry point) across hale passage toward lummi island, washington. the night sky was crystal clear, and i was marveling both at how incredibly calm and glassy the sound was and that i could even see the stars reflections in the water. i'd never seen the water so calm there, especially to be able to see the stars reflecting in it, so i got out of my car and stood at the railing as the ferry slowly left strawberry point and chugged toward the island's landing dock (i'd guess it only goes 10mph or so). about one minute out, i saw what i assumed were two lights on a car (one white the other red) across the water rounding a bend on haxton way, the road that curves along the southern tip of the lummi indian reservation (across hale passage from lummi island) approximately 3/4 mile from the ferry. i guessed i was seeing one headlight and one red running light on a car, close together, but they weren't following that curve in the road i was very familiar with. and because i could see those lights' star-like long reflections in the calm waters, i continued tracking them awhile. but when the lights moved beyond the end of that small peninsula, and carried on out into the strait between the mainland and small island just off it across portage bay--can't recall name of that island, its the lummi tribe's sacred island off limits to non-tribe members--i knew they weren't from a car of course. as the ferry got about halfway out on the 6 minute crossing, i began to assume i was seeing the running lights on a lummi fishing vessel. but even over the sound of the ferry's engine i normally would be able to hear a fishing boat's engine from that distance, approx. 3-500 feet by now. the two lights, a white one with a red one right next to it, continued on--perhaps just a few feet over the water--and so, still unsure of i exactly what i was tracking, i waited for this "boat" to cut across the many long, narrow reflections of house lights on the reservation's shoreline shining across the absolutely flat, still sound water. i was waiting for those reflections to be interrupted and stirred about, which a boat's wake would do. but when these two lights--which appeared now to be moving faster than any fishing boat could, and i thought i might be seeing some fast harbor patrol boat or such speeding out toward open waters--crossed paths with those house light refections and did not alter them in any way, the hair on my neck stood up. it was impossible. at this moment a man waiting in the car behind mine jumped out to the railing, he was seeing the same thing i was, and we exchanged silent shrugs, hands up in air etc as if to say 'what was that?' i then next saw the red and white lights pair moving so fast, just over the water and curving northwest beyond strawberry point and out toward sea and out of sight past the northern tip of lummi island, that i let out a loud gasp and 'what the f--k' exclamation. i expected the other guy to reply, but he just shook his head and quickly got back in his car without saying a word. having seen another unexplained light phenomena on lummi island the year prior (i just posted that sighting to mufon earlier)--and having zero explanation for any boat cutting across those house lights reflections without a single ripple in said reflections, its completely impossible--i was absolutely sure i'd just seen a ufo. when the ferry reached the lummi island dock, i asked a ferry worker directing traffic off the boat if he'd seen those lights. at first he just gave me a weird look, but then he said 'lots of odd things happen over here' as he waved me to drive on up the landing's ramp. i was of course stunned by all this, driving my car up the road and pulling off at the first pullout i could find with a clear view of hale passage to look for more lights, etc. i must've sat there looking for an hour, trying to digest what had just happened. will never forget it. it was 9 years ago--i just heard about mufon on the radio so just now reporting--but, especially writing about it now, it feels all the more vivid in my mind. thanks for running a place like mufon...
content.summary: Two parallel lights moving fast just above ocean surface

content.detailedDescription: Having just left a weekly discussion group meeting along constitution ave on lummi island wa, approximately 1/4 mile from the island's general store and ferry crossing dock, i turned right on constitution when i saw a red glowing orb-like light, perhaps 3-5 feet in diameter, hovering 5 feet above road level about 75 feet ahead of me. at first it appeared stationary and i thought it might be some odd glow from a house light, but as i accelerated west on constitution it began moving ahead of me in apparent unison/speed with my car now up to 20 mph. this 2-lane road cuts through thick, tall trees and passes just one house for approximately 1/4 mile before a 90-degree right turn--and its very dark on lummi island--so once i'd passed that house (and its one porch light) i knew this red light orb couldn't be attributed to any manmade light or reflection. it continued ahead of me on the road, its red light glowing into the trees it passed, for perhaps 20 seconds when--still about 75 feet ahead of my car--it followed the road's path taking a sharp left turn and disappeared behind the trees at that corner. the red glow of its lights increased there, leaving a short trail in its path and bathing the trees on both sides of the road perhaps halfway or further up those tall douglas firs. i accelerated to that corner to try and re-establish visual contact, but it was gone by the time i made the turn which is about 50 feet from the entrance to the tree frog farm's entrance gate. throughout this experience i felt that rush of excitement combined with fear that i might be seeing non-human, at first unsure but then fear rose and goosebumps up my spine when i saw that not only was it moving, but apparently  tracking my speed as it kept the same distance from my car down the road. i wondered if it was possibly the light on the back of very fast bicyclist, or single tail light of a car driving with its headlights off--but when it made that sharp left turn and accelerated like no bike or even fast car could around that corner, i knew it was something else. and that stunned me. i stopped my car well past tree frog farm, where the road cuts through a clearing beside a field about 1/4 mile from my cabin, when i realized i'd lost the red glowing orb. my thoughts raced, and i wondered if there could be any connection between this light's appearance and the fact our discussion group had just been talking about the possibility of ufos on lummi island. one member had been describing her experience of living there many years before when the navy had actually dived to investigate a famous ufo sighting (it had dived into the waters just south of lummi, i believe back in the 60s or 70s. i will never forget that experience (and another i had on lummi a year later, which i'll detail in next submission here). sorry i'm just now reporting it 10 years later, but i just now heard of mufon on coast to coast recently and thought i should mention it.)
content.summary: Red orb ahead on road

content.detailedDescription: Driving tractor and trailer sounth in pa. looked up and saw object hovering over mountain top. about that time other truckers where heard on cb chatting about seeing the same thing. the object was quite a distance away but was still very visible. so actual size was very big. not sure exact location however it was close to the allegheny tunnel.
content.summary: Hovering over mountain top. other truckers saw it and commented

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a low hill at the intersection of pine and n. yale.  i was delivering newspapers at around 4:00 am (+/- 20 min) on january 7, 1962 (+/- 7 days, best estimate).  because of a previous sighting from this location appx. 3 weeks previous, i stopped again when i was at this location, to look around just in case i saw another.

i was looking southward.  i noticed what i at first took to be a meteor igniting in the atmosphere at high altitude, perhaps entering the atmosphere at 15,000 or so mph, or faster.  it was glowing bright white when i first saw it, and it quickly began to glow much brighter as it descended from about 25-30 degrees above horizon to only three or four degrees above.  it descended at an angle of about 75-80 degrees from east down to west.  this was at an approximate distance of 8 miles to the south east: 8 south, 1 east.  as the object descended it "gradually" (given the high speed) slowed until coming to a complete stop at an altitude of (at the estimated distance) of 5,000'.  it remained therefor perhaps 10-15 seconds, gradually losing brightness until half apparent brightness.  it then moved suddenly, going eastward at an apparent speed at that estimated distance of one mile in 2 to 2-1/2 seconds, or perhaps 1500 mph.  i lost sight of it as it simply dimmed out of view approximately five miles eastward of where it had stopped after descending.
content.summary: Very bright object descended at high speed, stopped in place, then move away.

content.detailedDescription:
On november 15, 1961 (+/- 7 days), at 4:00 am (+/- 20 min), at the corner of north yale and pine.  i was delivering newspapers.  this is the second of three experiences i am reporting.  it was cold (<30f) and very clear.  this intersection is on a slight hill and downtown tulsa was clearly visible in the distance, at approximately 4+ miles.

i had stopped to look at the sky and the view of the skyline in the distance, and i was thinking about the sighting i had, appx. six weeks prior.  i looked around and noticed a saucer at around 450 feet altitude, north-north east of me, at 80 above the horizon.  it was approximately 45 feet in diameter, about fist size at arm length.  the edges were sharp and clear enough that i could estimate distance without reference to scale objects nearby.

the object was traveling east south east at around 60 mph (50-75 mph) or about the same speed as a car going a bit too fast for city streets.  it was apparently on a course from passing just south of the tulsa airport toward slightly north of downtown tulsa.

i watched as the object continued at the same altitude and speed toward downtown, at least until it was passing within a few blocks of the city center four+ miles away (4 mi east, 1 mi south), and until it was about 1/2 mile past downtown.  then it abruptly changed direction to probably directly north.  it continued in that direction and at the same altitude for 2 miles, now at about 100 mph, or less than twice the speed at which it originally passed over me.  at about two miles north of downtown, it very abruptly changed direction and speed.  it angled upward to ~40 degrees and suddenly accelerated to at least 4000 mph, and continued on that course and speed until it was no longer visible among the stars.  the estimate of 4000+ mph is based on the fact that it seemed while flying at a 40 degree angle, it covered two miles of terrain in under two seconds.  thus, min. 3600 mph ground speed at 40 degrees climb.

i was not particularly affected by this sighting, emotionally or psychologically, given, i believe, the persistence of some effects from my prior sighting.  that is, i was calm about it and not particularly excited apart from a feeling of confirmation of my thoughts and recollections.  i felt no lasting effects as i had prior to the previous experience (trance-like and memory loss).
content.summary: Single disk, 45' diameter, first at appx 450' altitude, 60 mph, made abrupt turns and accelerated to 4000+ mph.

content.detailedDescription:
I was delivering newspapers on allegheny street at 3:30 am (+/- 20 min) on october 4, 1961 (+/- 5 days).  i was in the street mid-block.  the sky was perfectly clear, no clouds or other obstructions, a few small scattered trees, thick star canopy.  for no particular reason than the sizes of the objects, i noticed directly above me two disks.  i immediately thought "flying saucers".  each disk was appx. 45 feet in diameter, convex on the bottom.  they were moving nne directly toward the tulsa airport at appx. 10-15 mph.  they were at 125' altitude, the second directly behind the first at a distance of appx. 60', same altitude.

the under surfaces of each pulsed in pale brass color, but with a moderately dull-looking finish (i.E., not shiny).  as the objects passed overhead and neared the horizon, at 25 degrees or so, the upper surface became more visible.  it was also convex.  the upper surface had a whitish dome that remained constant in color--not a bright white, but slightly brighter than the under side brightness.  apart from the dome, the upper side had very little brightness and was greyish in color.

objects were completely silent.  i heard nothing, and apparently neither did the numerous dogs in the neighborhood.

my immediate feeling was that this was a most extraordinary thing to see and i wanted to find others to alert, who could also be witnesses.  as i gave something of a start, as though to go knock on a door, i suddenly became quite calm about the event.  (actually, at no time was i alarmed or frightened, nor do i think i would have been so in any circumstance.)  with this very certain calmness, and still with a very clear head, i decided instead to simply watch these things and "savor" this moment.  in retrospect, the sudden dropping away of any excitement was very unusual, and i attribute it now to an effect brought on deliberately by the object and/or its operators.  i watched as the objects flew on at the same speed and very low altitude until they were no longer visible behind the houses and trees in the neighborhood.

with that same sense of calm and acceptance, i continued on to complete my rounds that morning, then went home to sleep more before going to school (high school, 10th grade).  after a couple of hours of sleep i awoke with a start, fearing i had not done my rounds that morning, but as i bolted upright, i then recalled the morning up until i saw the objects in the sky.  i can remember what i did immediately after they were no longer visible: i continued on for several blocks considering the matter.  but beyond, say, 5 minutes past the event up until i awoke in bed, i can recall virtually nothing at all.

i am absolutely certain this was not a hallucination and not a dream.  it was impossible for me to have been mistaken in my observation.  my father was a chief instrument mechanic at a local aircraft repair center (spartan), and i had a very thorough knowledge of aircraft and electronic principles at that age.  i had been in airplanes many times, and had seen a variety of airplanes.  for as long as ten years i had been collecting photos of common and exotic airplanes, and my father and i often played at aircraft identification when outside together.  my father eventually went on to become a faa principal in electronics and powerplant, overseeing several major us and foreign airlines.

i subsequently saw a single object of the same appearance, on approximately mid november, 1961.  in january 1962 i believe i saw a similar object at a longer distance.  i am filing these separately.
content.summary: Observed two slow moving 45' disks at 125' altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window. i've notice the bright green light. i think the object was a weird shape. a triangle shape at the back ground and then i zoomed away. i was shocked after i disappeared. the object zoomed out of sight.
content.summary: Triangle bright lights

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a small white object travel ne and made no noise. i took pictures as i observed this at 7:20 pm yesterday evening. i went back inside and came out 10 minutes later and also observed a strange cloud-like formation which i also took a picture of. i would be glad to send you the pictures so you could possibly enhance or enlarge them. you may have to enlarge the pictures to see the object which i have attempted to center in each picture.
content.summary: White disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
First saw it while in sabino canyon. bright star like object that moved slowly then would stop and hover. after hovering would change direction move slightly change direction then stop and hover again. most of the time it seemed to be reflecting light it would get very very bright then dim out almost completely. at times it seemed to emit a bright orange glow the  fade out again. it never moved quickly but changed its direction quite a bit. no characteristics of a plane or helicopter. we watched it for approximately 45 minutes. 
finally we went home still watching it- at times it would seem over head and then would move off again. at home continued to watch it heading toward the south. went inside checked back a few minutes later- there within twenty minutes lost sight after going inside.
awesome.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright hovering object in very bright sky. sat hovering would move off then back again. no sound. seemed to pulsate light or reflect light as if rotating. changed direction. seemed to emit orange light ocassionally.45 minute duration

content.detailedDescription: i was at my computer which over looks the carquinez  straits when i noticed from my window this ufo floating down over the hills across from the straits. i knew it was something that i had never seen before. it was very large and it glowed like the moon or a 60 watt light bulb.  no sound no other lights. it was moving from the north going south.  i last saw it by an electric tower. i knew i had captured something so i had a sense of satisfaction however, i didn't download or view the photos because i felt i needed permission and they were not to be viewed at that time. i am a very nosey person by nature.  this was on tuesday and i felt i was given  permission to view them on the following saturday. i didn't think the photos were that good and i was having trouble viewing them and downloading on my new computer i became frustrated and sort of gave up. i'm not sure why but i felt this strong need to look at them again last night. i was able to resolve all the problems that had precluded me from viewing them.  i know what i saw and felt and it was something i will never forget.  i am very open to many things and i just want someone else to look at what i saw that night.
content.summary: Ufo sighting crockett, ca 12082012

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting outside in front of our house which faces south.
we were listening to the music event that was taking place about three blocks from us.
saw a glowing blue ball of light in the sky 
comming in from the southwest.
thought at first it was a plane flying to low and fast
but it had no red plane lights or plane headlights
just a glowing blue sphere comming right in my direction.
it wasn't very high but it was above treetop level
it seemed to be moving at a road speed of 4o-45mph.
it travelled in a smooth straight path over my house 
and continued onward into the northeast. 
we watched it untill went out of sight.
we were more amused than amazed.
i text some friends about it.
content.summary: Glowing electric blue sphere of light size of basket ball travelling in a smooth straight path from the southwest going northeast

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound and saw the 2 objects hovering in the sky. 1 on top of another, i first thought it was a star. or the planet venus. i ruled that out, i rules it out as conventional aircraft because it had no aviation lights. inlive by an airport and it was neither flying away nor coming to me as i was by the airport. i filmed this event traveling north at 60mph and posted the video on youtube.
content.summary: Ufo even in palmdale near base

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were swinging on the swings at the park at around 9 or 10pm. we decided to take a break and lie down on the pavement to stargaze. that's when we observed the moving white light in the sky. it could be mistaken for an immensely bright star at first sight, but it was moving and we had compared it to a plane which was flying near it - there was clearly a difference. the ufo was flying in one direction and whipped around coming back towards us. it was when it was stationary above us that i could see upon closer inspection that it in fact had three lights on the ufo forming a triangle. it had stayed stationary for a few minutes and then flew into the clouds.


  o
 o
  o

the lights looked something like that ^

i hope this was a clear enough description. ^-^
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed a moving light in the sky above the park.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the basketball game in the kitchen when i got a call that i wanted to take privately, so i stepped out of the side door of the house. as i was in a heated debate on the phone, i looked up and noticed something in the distance above the treeline. i stared at it, and as i did so, short bursts of flame began to come from the bottom of the object. the flame would switch from left to right as the object wobbled a bit; as if it was trying to maintain balance. that's when i yelled to my girlfriend to "go get my camera". she did, but it took at least 40 seconds for her to do so. as i continued to stare at the object, waiting for my camera, i noticed that the flame at the bottom of the object began to lose it's intensity. as the flame went from a full flame to just a red glow, i noticed that the object was slowly losing altitude, and drifting slowly south east, toward lake michigan. as it dropped below the treeline, i began to run out of the yard and down the street so i can see around that particular treeline. i could, and again, i could see the object. the red glow at the bottom of the object was barely noticeable at this point, and the object began to descend more straight down than southeast and down as it was before. it began to lose altitude faster, until it went below the treeline at that location, which was approximately half a city block to the south of where i was when i first began to record. i waited at this location for about 30 minutes for the object to ascend or reapear, but it never did. while i was recording, i was not looking at the viewfinder; i was just pointing the lens in the direction of the object, so i had no idea if i actually had what i was seeing on the camcorder. but after a discussion with neighbors and others who were present, i went inside, connected the camcorder to the television, and began to view the footage. i've been from that point on, compelled to find out what i saw is. i contacted the local police, military, faa, news stations, etc., trying to find out if they had anything on the radar at that time and area of that day, but.....Nothing; even though i expressed to them all that i had this thing on video!! this incident has not only caused me a great deal of concern, it has changed my life, and challenges many things i believe. i have always been open to the possibility of the existence of such things, but never saw anything that came anywhere near actually convincing me that they are real. all that has changed now though. that thing had no sound whatsoever, it had no wings, and it had no tail end. it looked almost like a giant church bell with a flame at the bottom. had i not recorded what i was seeing, i would have long since just assumed it was something normal, that can be explained. but after viewing this thing in slow motion on zoom, i am convinced that it is not, and can not. i will be attaching a copy of my video with this report (if it will upload). my animus is to have an expert opinion of what it is that is on my video. it was certainly intelligently operated, and it was definitely a mechanical craft of some sort, and not a balloon or anything like that. i for some reason had a feeling of desperation as this thing was descending. it is the same desperate feeling i felt that made me look in that direction and up in the first place when i first noticed the object. i'm left feeling as though whatever it was, it was losing power, running out of fuel, or something to that effect, because it seemed to be struggling to maintain it's altitude. it was a struggle that it evidently lost. the object was moving slowly in the direction of the lake; which leads me to believe that it was attempting to get out over open water. in  fact, it seemed to be trying very diligently to do so. i have no idea if it landed in the water or over land. all i know is it landed or crashed somewhere slightly south east of where i was, and never came back up. after you review my video, please get back to me and let me know what you think. thank you; verily.
content.summary: Object was hovering with short bursts of flame coming from bottom. it was moving slowly to the south while descending.

which leads me to believe that it was attempting to get out over open water. in  fact, it seemed to be trying very diligently to do so. i have no idea if it landed in the water or over land. all i know is it landed or crashed somewhere slightly south east of where i was, and never came back up. after you review my video, please get back to me and let me know what you think. thank you; verily.
content.summary: Object was hovering with short bursts of flame coming from bottom. it was moving slowly to the south while descending.

content.detailedDescription: Was just sitting outside for the evening. was a bright glowing object caught my attention. it almost appeared to be what looked like a chinese glowing lantern, however, it then picked up speed and disintegrated. i was very scared, shaking, hair on end. there were 2 of us that seen the object. just as quick as it was gone, we both turned around and there was another large flash through the air, quick, so quick we couldn't tell what it was, or if it was the same type of object. as quick as a falling star for the second one. just caught our attention, but scared us both and hair on end. i was extremely scared. the original siting just eventually just disintegrated and never came back. so strange!
content.summary: Orange-ish glowing orb-like

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside with my camera.  i was taking pictures of the moon.  i didn't see the unidentified object at the time.  later i was reviewing my pictures and noticed the anomaly, from my position, just to the bottom right of the moon.  i am not sure what this is but would like to know.  i originally sent the images to the national mufon but have heard nothing. i am submitting all the shots i have.  it is the same picture i just enlarged it.
content.summary: Didn't see it until i happened to review the picture and noticed it.

content.detailedDescription: I watched the firey object glide silently through the sky.At first i thaught it was one of those candle kite things you can light that fly until i seen move above the trees towards me and noticed it was alot bigger than thatand had a diamond shape inside the fire. went got the camera but it was full so i had to use the crappy cell phone camera which took a few crappy pictures. i am very dissapointed in myself.
content.summary: I was smoking a ciggarette on my deck and seen the fire light through the canopy of pine trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was searching for any simular reports of an object that i saw on 10-10-2012. i came across an exact sighting of what i saw and i have the video of it. below is the case/log number of the sighting that matches what i observed.


case number: 42814

log number: us-09252012-0009


as discribed by the observer in the case and log number above i also had the same plane which at times i wasn't sure who was following who. after i stopped taking video so i could try and follow the object the plane turned sharply toward the silver object. the object began to increase in speed until i could no longer see it. the object i saw was in parsippany, nj. i pulled over and took video from my cellular phone in amazement. i observed the object when it was a little closer prior to taking the video. this object was thick and solid and not a piece of floating trash. also at the time the video was taken there was little or no wind.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Left work and saw object during commute home. pulled off highway to take video of event until object was to far.

content.detailedDescription: Stay for 30 mins and did not move and disperacer
content.summary: Stay for 30 mins and did not move and disperacer

content.detailedDescription: Walking and seen that a really dark storm was moving in.  looking up at the clouds and the storm moving in i seen chrome ball about the size of basketball hovering about 150 feet from me above houses right before storm. object then moved very slowly away then vanished. took a few pictures on my cell phone.
content.summary: Seen right before storm chrome ball hovering then moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: My wife & two sons were returning from a funeral service from san jose. we were traveling on hwy 152 approximately 20 minutes ease of los banos at which time my wife first noticed a object with a blue light appear perpendicular to the highway and approximately a 1/3 mile in front of our car. seconds later i caught a glimpse of the object and asked my wife :what is that? it's moving so fast and it's so low to  the ground. we watched it for about twenty seconds as it went directly in front of us and then continued in a straight path and then it suddenly appeared to reverse direction and then these three bright lights appear (at this time it appeared the object was 1/8 mile out to the right of us)horizontally and the object proceeded to descend/hover about a 30 degree angle. the object landed and i wanted to stop and investigate however my wife said that we need to keep driving. i did not want to argue with her. if i was alone i surely would have stopped the car and walked however how long to see what was there. anyway that's what actually happened.
content.summary: Traveling extremely fast

content.detailedDescription:
As a first time witness but a long time believer i was frozen and mesmerized. it was about 11: 47pm and i was talking to my friend out side of work, when another coworker runs to us and say: look!!!! look!! ... i turned around and maybe 1000ft away (very close) i see the object as big as 4 suv parked side by side (sorry didn't know what to compare it to) with random flashing green, red, orange on exterior coming down in vertical movement but very slow. then it speed up coming down very fast maybe 1.5 miles in less than second, then poof!!! a little bright flash and it was gone. the whole thing took a little less than 11 sec. i stood there for 10 mins waiting and praying that it will show up again, but nothing. i hope other people saw the same thing or maybe even more.

i believe

r.
content.summary: It was amazing!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was 5/6 years old, we were attending a football game in 1968. my friends and i were sliding down a grassy hill at the end of the field on cardboard. i looked up and saw 4/5 bright lights in the sky above the field, electric blue and very large. together they made a diamond shape, they just sat there for around 20 minutes. i continued to watch the whole time, the rest of the people at the game saw it but as country people they just sort of ignored the thing. after a time the lights spun very quickly and shot off toward the south. i lived on a farm not to far from fort rucker, i have seen all sorts of aircraft in my life, nothing has compared to this in any way. this has stuck with me all my life.

 after this event the worst part came, soon after i saw something that there is really no way to describe. i cant call it human nor animal, it was very tall thin and a dark , almost steel or gunmetal gray. this thing was on our farm and it seemed interested in watching me. the terror i felt is indescribable, it came into our house and was standing in the doorway. i get chills just thinking about it. its skin had a sort of shine to it and its eyes were a different color of grey on the outside and black on the inside. round and seemed to be able to move not only in and out but in different directions.

it was always quiet, never made a sound, but it did manipulate the environment, such as the doors in our home. it was able to do this without touching them, almost like a thought process. after going through this as a child, taking place over around a year on numerous occasions, i have never been the same. my life changed at that moment and i have never really felt comfortable sense, as an adult am i afraid no, however i am very aware of the impact that this had on me as a child. when outside at night i stare into the deep sky and remember this event, i have looked expecting to see them again for the all these years. they have never come back.
content.summary: It could have been as many as 5, bright lights just hovering, no noise, then quickly left

content.detailedDescription: On may 18th 2013 i witness the three objects in the sky, one object was moving westward slowly in between the clouds, the cloud coverage on that night was only approximately maybe 3000 feet. as the object moves through the clouds it illuminated the cloud each time it passed through one. the object look like some sort of the sphere glowing. approximately five minutes later 2 more objects we're headed east at a much greater speed making identical patters in the sky together.
content.summary: I witnessed 3 ufos within a 7-minute timeline, with remarkable aerodynamic ability.

content.detailedDescription:
3 distinct white shapes in the distance. looked triangular
i snapped a few shots at an amusement park. i did not see anything in the sky at that time. it was only later when reviewing the pics did i notice the objects
content.summary: 3 distinct white shapes in the distance. looked triangular
